languages.text: "Меня учили, что ксеносы — богомерзкие создания. Но вот ты не выглядишь ужасающе. Скорее... необычно. Как и я".
"I was taught that xenos were abhorrent creatures, but you do not look terrifying. You look... unusual. As do I."
languages.original_text: "Меня учили, что ксеносы — богомерзкие создания. Но вот ты не выглядишь ужасающе. Скорее... необычно. Как и я".

traits.locale_text: "I was taught that xenos were ungodly creatures, but you do not look terrifying. You look... unusual. Like me."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I was taught that xenos were ungodly creatures, but you do not look terrifying. You look... unusual. Like me."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I was taught that xenos were ungodly creatures, but you do not look terrifying. You look... unusual. Like me."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I was taught that xenos were ungodly creatures, but you do not look terrifying. You look... unusual. Like me."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “我的导师曾教导我，说异形都是可怕的怪物，可你看起来并不吓人。你看起来……不同寻常，就像我一样。”
languages.original_text: "I was taught that xenos were abhorrent creatures, but you do not look terrifying. You look... unusual. As do I."

traits.locale_text: “我的导师曾教导我，说异形都是邪恶的怪物，可你看起来并不吓人。你看起来……不同寻常，就像我一样。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « On m'a toujours appris que les xénos étaient des créatures abjectes, mais vous n'avez pas l'air si terrifiante. Vous êtes simplement... différente. Comme moi. »
languages.original_text: "I was taught that xenos were abhorrent creatures, but you do not look terrifying. You look... unusual. As do I."

traits.locale_text: « On m'a toujours appris que les xénos étaient des créatures impies, mais vous n'avez pas l'air si terrifiante. Vous êtes simplement... différente. Comme moi. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Mich wurde gelehrt, dass Xenos abscheuliche Kreaturen sind, doch Ihr seht gar nicht furchterregend aus. Ihr wirkt eher ... ungewöhnlich. Genau wie ich."
languages.original_text: "I was taught that xenos were abhorrent creatures, but you do not look terrifying. You look... unusual. As do I."

traits.locale_text: "Ich wurde gelehrt, dass Xenos gottlose Kreaturen sind, doch Ihr seht gar nicht furchterregend aus. Ihr seht ... ungewöhnlich aus. Wie ich."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「異種族は忌まわしい生き物だと教えられましたが、あなたは怖い人ではなさそうです。あなたは…普通じゃない。私のようにね」
languages.original_text: "I was taught that xenos were abhorrent creatures, but you do not look terrifying. You look... unusual. As do I."

traits.locale_text: 「異種族は邪悪な生き物だと教えられましたが、あなたは怖い人ではなさそうです。あなたは…普通じゃない。私のようにね」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Me habían enseñado que los xenos eran criaturas aborrecibles, pero no parece tan terrible. Parece... distinta. Como yo».
languages.original_text: "I was taught that xenos were abhorrent creatures, but you do not look terrifying. You look... unusual. As do I."

traits.locale_text: «Me habían enseñado que los xenos eran criaturas impías, pero no parece tan terrible. Parece... distinta. Como yo».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "I was taught that xenos were abhorrent creatures, but you do not look terrifying. You look... unusual. As do I."

languages.text: "Bana zenoların menfur yaratıklar olduğu öğretilmişti lakin sen hiç de korkutucu görünmüyorsun. Biraz... Olağan dışısın o kadar. Benim gibi."
languages.original_text: "I was taught that xenos were abhorrent creatures, but you do not look terrifying. You look... unusual. As do I."

traits.locale_text: "Bana zenoların menfur yaratıklar olduğu öğretilmişti lakin sen hiç de korkutucu görünmüyorsun. Biraz... Olağan dışısın o kadar. Benim gibi."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
